nodes.text: A vibro-ax, or vibro-axe, was a type of ax that used a compact generator to create vibrations along the cutting edge's surface, which significantly increased the weapon's lethality. There existed one-handed and two-handed models. Similar vibration-based technology could be found in vibro-blades, vibro-knives, vibro-pikes, and vibro-lances.

Vibro-axes were wielded by many thugs across the galaxy. The pig-like Gamorreans, for example, often used them. During the Galactic Civil War, some Gamorrean mercenaries favored a particular model of vibro-ax known as Arg'garok
Bounty hunter Ketsu Onyo owned a staff that was equipped with a vibro-ax on the end of it for close-range combat.
The Weequay Pagetti Rook wielded a BD-1 Cutter vibro-ax during his service under Jabba the Hutt.
